programme.title: O Guardio, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: Cidade do Silncio, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Lauren, uma jornalista, enviada para cobrir os estupros seguidos de morte que vm ocorrendo na fronteira entre os EUA e o Mxico. Chegando l, descobre que esses crimes so apenas a ponta do iceberg muito mais complexa do que se poderia imaginar.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Assassino Americano, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Sentinela, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente do servio secreto acusado de homicdio precisa limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: As complicaes surgem durante uma situao perigosa de refm em um restaurante.

programme.title: O Esconderijo, (2012, Thriller)
programme.desc: Dave e a esposa Amy encontram uma casa perfeita. Tudo lindo at que eles descobrem que os tijolos esto cheios de herona. Encurralados por criminosos, eles percebem que podem perder no s a residncia, mas tambm suas vidas.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken!
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conectando Coraes
programme.desc: Acreditando que o novo jutsu do naruto est quase pronto, jiraiya vai investigar novas informaes sobre as aes da akatsuki

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Noite Chuvosa
programme.desc: Atrs do esconderijo, rinji e gozu descobrem que um shinobi seguiu seus passos. Kakashi e sua equipe notam que o inimigo est usando um morcego para vigilncia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Amuletos
programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha naruto est ocupado treinando com gamakichi e gamatatsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Inimigo Invisvel
programme.desc: A equipe yamato segue para dar reforo equipe kakashi. Bem antes de sua partida naruto recebe uma dica para aperfeioar seu novo jutsu entrando na barriga de gamatatsu

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Labirinto Dos Reflexos Distorcidos
programme.desc: Atravs dos resultados da anlise dos insetos parasitrios cristalizados, os inimigos atualmente lutando com a equipe kakashi so identificados como usurios do estilo cristal, um tipo raro de jutsu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Alvo Revelado
programme.desc: Quebrando o campo de fora com seu recente jutsu com os sapos, naruto e a unidade de apoio chega ao local da batalha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Besta De Cauda Barulhenta
programme.desc: Os ninjas da folha usam os morcegos para procurar guren. Akamaru e kiba descobrem um alto nvel de chakra em seu destino

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Dentro Do Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Dentro de uma nvoa pesada, os ninjas da folha tentam achar o naruto. A equipe aumenta a guarda quando fica sabendo que a nvoa que cerca o lago causa iluses.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sentimento De Cada Um
programme.desc: Naruto entra na nvoa para procurar yukimaru. Guren fica alerta para proteger yukimaru, cuja situao atual o impede de se mexer.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Buscando melhorar a reputao do Cl Nara, um ancio do cl diz para Shikadai desistir de se tornar um ninja e virar um poltico.

programme.sub-title: Jugo e a Marca da Maldio

programme.desc: Seguindo as ordens de Konohamaru, Sumire e o resto da Equipe 15 voltam para relatar a situao, mas no caminho so atacados por um inimigo misterioso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Suigetsu querem ajudar Jugo, mas no conseguem por conta dos sedativos que receberam. Enquanto isso, os pssaros com a Marca da Maldio comeam a se juntar e migrar!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 enviada em uma misso para ajudar a capturar um ladro de joias, mas acaba perdendo o rastro dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki se sente mal e decide passar no centro de pesquisa de Orochimaru. Mitsuki explica a Orochimaru que nunca teve sonhos enquanto dormia, mas que recentemente passou a sonhar.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps alguns dias de misso, Mirai vai nas fontes termais com Tenten, uma ex-aluna de Guy, mas o momento relaxante interrompido quando Guy grita que viu um fantasma.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai sai do hotel com Tatsumi sem falar nada para Kakashi e Guy. Nas fontes termais, Mirai acredita ver Asuma, seu pai, mas h alguma coisa estranha.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O rei da Mirai!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Naruto e Shikamaru debatem sobre o que fazer com os participantes da Prova Chunin que no puderam concluir devido ao ataque dos Otsutsuki. Sasuke retorna e busca por pistas do Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Shikadai como capito, Boruto, Iwabe e Wasabi formam uma equipe especial e saem em busca de uma flor rara que floresce por pouco tempo.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)

programme.desc: Um tubaro gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a mar comea a subir, o tubaro mutante de duas cabeas ressurge e ningum est a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Half of Gaaras body has transformed and Sasuke continues his battle against him.

programme.title: By the time Naruto and Sakura catch up, Sasuke has exhausted his strength and collapsed.

programme.title: Naruto is helpless against Garas immense power. While Naruto declares that he fights for his comrades, Gaara says he fights for himself.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is helpless against Gaaras overpowering strength. However, after seeing Sasuke risking life and limb to save him and Sakura
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gaara employs his Playing Possum Jutsu, which allows the Sand Spirit within him, Shukaku, to display its true power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With every ounce of their power, Gaara and Naruto continue to fight. Determined to protect Sakura, Naruto attacks Gaara again and again.

programme.title: Orochimaru's plan to destroy the Village Hidden in the Leaves is stopped.

programme.title: Kakashi arrives in the nick of time to help Asuma and Kurenai, and Itachi, too, enters the fray.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya and Naruto are on a journey to find Tsunade, one of the legendary Sannin.

programme.title: Intent on confronting Itachi, Sasuke rushes to the town where Naruto is staying.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya saves Naruto from Kisame just in time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Deeply hurt mentally and physically, Sasuke is taken back to the Hidden Leaf Village by Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto finally begins his training with Jiraiya.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto manages to complete the first step of his training.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto suddenly appear before Tsunade and Shizune who are out sightseeing.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: In exchange for healing his arms, Orochimaru offers to bring back to life Tsunade's younger brother Nawaki and Dan, her sweetheart.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimarus offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimarus tempting offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Narutos ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Donnie Brasco, (1997, Crime)
programme.desc: Posing as jewel broker Donnie Brasco, FBI agent Joseph D. Pistone (Johnny Depp) is granted entrance into the violent mob family of aging hit man Lefty Ruggiero (Al Pacino).

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's epic film set in mid-19th century Lower Manhattan tells the story of a young Irish immigrant (Leonardo DiCaprio) seeking revenge against the rival gang leader who killed his father.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: The Departed, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in Boston, this police thriller follows a gangster who infiltrates the police department and a cop who infiltrates the gang simultaneously. The two find out that a mole exists within the organizations and race to uncover each other's identity.

programme.title: The Gentlemen, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A British drug lord tries to sell off his highly profitable empire to a dynasty of Oklahoma billionaires.

programme.title: S.W.A.T., (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Two veterans team up with a pair of rookies to form the most freewheeling S.W.A.T. team ever. Their first assignment: transport an international drug kingpin into federal custody - after he's offered $100 million to anyone who will free him!

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: An expert in anti-terrorism tactics, hotshot LAPD officer Paul Cutler (GABRIEL MACHT, Behind Enemy Lines) is ordered to Detroit to train its S.W.A.T. team in the latest hostage rescue techniques. Rated R

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist, who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: S.W.A.T., (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Two veterans team up with a pair of rookies to form the most freewheeling S.W.A.T. team ever. Their first assignment: transport an international drug kingpin into federal custody - after he's offered $100 million to anyone who will free him!

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: An expert in anti-terrorism tactics, hotshot LAPD officer Paul Cutler (GABRIEL MACHT, Behind Enemy Lines) is ordered to Detroit to train its S.W.A.T. team in the latest hostage rescue techniques. Rated R

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Under Siege, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: A SWAT compound comes under fire from an international terrorist, who relentlessly and violently pursues a mystery man who was apprehended by Seattle SWAT after a raid went horribly wrong.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Out-of-control comedy features Jim Carrey at his hilarious best as a hard-wired cable installer just looking for a friend. Matthew Broderick co-stars.

programme.title: Idle Hands, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Go, (1999, Screwball)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: The Fisher King, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: As Good as It Gets, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A heartwarming story of three outcasts coping with the frustrations of life in New York City. Starring Jack Nicholson as a curmudgeon and Greg Kinnear as a gay artist who live in the same building with Helen Hunt, the waitress who changes their lives.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Hailed as a landmark film that dazzles with deep emotion and exceptional acting, PHILADELPHIA stars Tom Hanks and Denzel Washington as two competing lawyers who join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars as Jay Gatsby, who had once loved beautiful, spoiled Daisy Buchanan (Mia Farrow), then lost her to a rich boy. But now Gatsby is mysteriously wealthy...and ready to risk everything to woo Daisy back.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Ned Kelly, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Mick Jagger makes his dynamic screen debut in this explosive tale based on the true-life story of the 19th-century Australian 'Armored Bandit,' who would become a mythic sagebrush hero even as the law closes in and prepares for an all-out war.

programme.title: Dillinger, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: An account of the notorious gangster, John Dillinger, from midway through his bank-robbing career up until his final shootout outside the Biograph Theatre.

programme.title: A Bridge Too Far, (1977, War)
programme.desc: With an all-star cast that includes Sean Connery, Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Olivier, Gene Hackman and Robert Redford, this epic WW II drama recreates Operation Market Garden, an ambitious plan to hasten the end of WW II that ended in disaster.

programme.title: Force 10 From Navarone, (1978, Action)
programme.desc: A group of allied commandos on a mission against the 3rd Reich has orders to blow a giant dam in order to crush a strategic bridge held by the Nazis.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Hiyori tells Zoro a stunning story of escaping the incident 20 years ago and surviving until the present day. Meanwhile, Luffy stills struggles to master the Haki of the Color of Arms, but a surprising person steps up and gives an example.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki - Ryuo!

programme.title: Luffy continues training himself to use Haki with Old Man Hyo's help, but the battle is suddenly suspended and shortly thereafter Raizo appears in front of them. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and the others are wondering who Tonoyasu really is.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!

programme.title: Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!

programme.title: By the time Kin'emon and the others notice that Yasuie is trying to sacrifice his life to save their raid plan, it was all too late. Ebisu Town's people laughing out loud annoys Zoro, but when Hiyori tells him the reason behind it, he is in for a shock!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!

programme.title: Hiyori and Shinobu tearfully tell the Straw Hats the truth behind Ebisu Town residents' cheerfulness and smiles, which infuriates them. When Yasuie's daughter, Toko, runs to her father's body, Orochi recognizes who she is and takes a shot at her!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi's clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!

programme.title: Zoro keeps fighting Kyoshiro, but Orochi's Oniwabanshu comes to back Kyoshiro up. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, Queen announces the restart of the Sumo Inferno with a new cruel rule.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!

programme.title: Kin'emon apologizes Ashura Doji AKA Shutenmaru for goading Holdem to attack Atamayama where Ashura's hideout was located, and asks him to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, Chopper and his group finally arrived at the Excavation Labor Camp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!

programme.title: Craving red-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates' Lead Performer who reins over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Grudge Over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!

programme.title: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!

programme.title: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!

programme.title: Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo's suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!

programme.title: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Were Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!

programme.title: The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!

programme.title: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi's ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie's dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!

programme.title: As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its Name is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!

programme.title: As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin'emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A New Alliance?! Kaidos Army Gathers!

programme.title: Kin'emon, Momonosuke, and the others can't fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive. Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!

programme.title: The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!

programme.title: Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!

programme.title: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!

programme.title: The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai's allies from their rendezvous.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here comes Kozuki Oden!

programme.title: When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin'emon, Oden steps in. Kin'emon is impressed when he sees Oden's strength and pledges his life to serve him.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!

programme.title: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!

programme.title: Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden's journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!

programme.title: In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin'emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Pirates is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?
programme.sub-title: Wads of Bills Blossomed in the Sunset of Rio

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?
programme.sub-title: I'll Teach You How to Transport Gold Bars

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!
programme.sub-title: Will the Leaving Tower of Pisa Be Standing?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: The Terminator, (1984, Thriller)

programme.title: Virtuosity, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Hes a composite of some 200 personalities, each and every one a notorious killer. Hes Sid 6.7, a virtual reality creation designed to put L.A. police officers to the test.

programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Alan Arkin and Jude Law star in this engrossing sci-fi thriller about an all-too-human man who dares to defy a system obsessed with genetic perfection. Rated: PG-13

programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Drama)

programme.title: What Women Want, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: After an accident, a chauvinistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.title: Blitz

programme.desc: Um policial veterano vai contra cultura policial da qual fez parte a sua carreira inteira.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: H 20 anos, um trgico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversrio da tragdia, o nico sobrevivente volta cidade em busca de uma vingana sangrenta.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotrio da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em srie passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano
programme.desc: Patrick Bateman um yuppie de Wall Street, obcecado com sucesso, status, estilo, com uma noiva deslumbrante. Ele tambm um assassino psictico que estupra, mata e desmembra estranhos e conhecidos sem provocao ou propsito.

programme.title: Espelhos do Medo
programme.desc: O mal usa espelhos para entrar na casa de um segurana com problemas.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe um detetive, mas tambm um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela prpria me, ele resolve contratar os servios de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua me.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh

programme.title: Tempestade de Meteoros
programme.desc: Para a astrnoma Michelle Young, um evento celestial nico se transforma em um pesadelo quando milhares de meteoros rompem a superfcie da atmosfera e bombardeiam a cidade de San Francisco.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Megaterremoto
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: O Alvo Final
programme.desc: Depois de matar o dono de um bar em uma briga, Bobby Kalinowsky, um ex-membro do SEAL, deve procurar sua filha sequestrada.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: O Guardio
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Sem Perdo
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vtima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajud-la em sua vingana. Para convenc-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Ninja
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Clube da Luta
programme.desc: Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado.

programme.title: Loucos Por Dinheiro
programme.desc: Diretor de presdio obriga dois homens a se casarem com suas filhas, por acreditar que elas estejam grvidas. Os novos cunhados decidem roubar um trem e fugir. Enquanto isso, uma agente do FBI chega cidade para investigar a morte de um prisioneiro.

programme.title: Deus nos Acuda!
programme.desc: Entrega especial para fs de comdia! Greg Kinnear (Auto Focus) estrela este filme agradvel dirigido por Garry Marshall (Uma Linda Mulher) sobre um trapaceiro sem nenhum valor que passa a se dar bem.

programme.title: Os Sete Suspeitos
programme.desc: Descubra todos os suspeitos e todas as suas artimanhas. Voc amar presenciar suas atrapalhadas enquanto no nmero de mortes e risadas aumenta perante seus olhos.

programme.title: ESCOLA DE IDIOTAS (2006)
programme.desc: Um jovem azarado se inscreve em um curso para ganhar confiana e ajudar a conquistar a garota dos seus sonhos, mas as coisas se complicam quando o professor tem o mesmo plano.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: O Chamado de Xangai
programme.desc: Um advogado de Nova York enviado a Xangai a negcios e logo enfrenta muitos problemas com a lei.

programme.title: Terapia do Sexo

programme.title: A batalha final das semifinais Tyson contra Ray, um invicto Blader. Kenny est trabalhando em algo e no est l na primeira rodada.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E6

programme.title: Tyson, Max e Kenny esto trabalhando em Dragoon para garantir a vitria nas finais quando o vov interrompe e revela a Tyson que seu 13 aniversrio! Aps a festa, a primeira rodada termina rapidamente, com Tyson derrotando Kai inesperadamente.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E7

programme.title: Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E8

programme.title: Kevin discorda dos BladeBreakers especialmente Ray e desafia Ray para uma batalha. Tyson j teve o suficiente e luta com Kevin, mas ele cai rapidamente na capacidade do Bey de balanar e se multiplicar.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E9

programme.title: O Torneio Asitico BBA est em andamento, no auge de uma torre inacreditavelmente alta na China. Os BladeBreakers e os White Tigers percebem que acabaro lutando entre si, e usam isso um contra o outro.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E10

programme.title: Com Kenny trabalhando a noite toda antes do dia do torneio, Kevin, do White Tigers, tenta esgueirar-se para onde esto dormindo, roubar e / ou destruir o Driger de Ray.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E11

programme.title: Ray deixa os BladeBreakers e viaja para as montanhas para tentar recuperar Driger. Mariah o encontra, bate em batalha, confronta-o com sua estupidez e pede que ele volte para os Tigres Brancos.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E12

programme.title: Os Tigres Brancos enfrentam os Pastores Spin. Devido fome, Gary perde para um membro. Mariah consegue literalmente destruir o Bey de seu oponente.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E13

programme.title: a manh das meias-finais do Asian Beyblade Tournament e Tyson consegue dormir. O resto do time sai cedo, mas Ray fica para trs para garantir que Tyson acorde.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E14

programme.title: As finais esto prestes a comear no Torneio de Qualificao Asitico, com a equipe vencedora avanando para o Campeonato Mundial BeyBlade. Na primeira rodada, Max vai contra Gary, do White Tigers, em uma das melhores trs batalhas.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E15

programme.title: Durante as finais do torneio asitico, Ray enfrenta seu antigo companheiro de equipe e ex-amiga Mariah.

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam aos EUA para o Torneio Americano. Durante uma visita a um centro de pesquisa da BBA, Max fica chocado ao saber que sua me trabalha l, e no na faculdade, como ele pensava.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E19

programme.title: Aps a derrota por no-competio para Emily, do All Starz, no BBA Research Center, os Blade Breakers esgueiram-se pelas instalaes de alta tecnologia, na esperana de aprender mais sobre a concorrncia.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E20

programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: Hell or High Water (2016)
programme.desc: With a Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) hot on their tail, an ex-convict (Ben Foster) and his brother (Chris Pine) plan a series of heists against the bank thats about to foreclose on their family ranch.

programme.title: American Sniper (2014)
programme.desc: Sniper and U.S. Navy SEAL Chris Kyle (Bradley Cooper) saves many lives on battlefields in Iraq while striving to be a good husband and father to his loved ones back in America.

programme.title: Braveheart (1995)
programme.desc: Enraged by the killing of his wife, Scotsman William Wallace leads a revolt against the tyrannical English king in the 13th century.

programme.title: The Last Gunfight (2025)
programme.desc: As the worlds top assassins fight to the death in a ruthless underground tournament, a rogue crew has its own deadly agenda: survive the carnage, outplay the killers and take down the mastermind behind it all.

programme.title: Rambo III (1988)
programme.desc: Former Special Forces agent John Rambo blasts through Soviet-occupied Afghanistan in search of his captive mentor.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: A Murder in the Park (2014)
programme.desc: Anthony Porters death sentence is commuted when another man confesses to the crime. After his release, many doubt his innocence and suspect that both men are pawns in a much larger plan.

programme.title: Singularity (2017)
programme.desc: In 2020, a supercomputer deems mankind a threat and launches an all-out attack. Nearly a century later, two teenagers struggle to survive in the rubble of a ruined world, hoping to reach a sanctuary where humans live without fear of robots.

programme.title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon (2021)
programme.sub-title: Mona Lisa and the Blood Moon (2021)
programme.desc: When a struggling single mother befriends a mysterious woman who has supernatural powers, she sees a lucrative opportunity to make some fast cash. However, their crime spree soon draws unwanted attention as the cops start to close in.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Hard Home (2024)
programme.desc: After the shocking murder of her daughter, a woman turns her high-tech home into a trap for the killer, initiating a deadly game of cat and mouse where every move can be fatal.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: Reluctantly pressed into service again, a former military sniper plots revenge against his powerful foes after being betrayed and wounded.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2 (2018)
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins wholl stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black (2016)
programme.desc: In a spoof of "Fifty Shades of Grey," wealthy entrepreneur Christian Black (Marlon Wayans) introduces a young woman (Kali Hawk) to his kinky world of SandM.

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: Uncommon Valor (1983)
programme.desc: A colonel with a sponsor leads five Marine veterans into Laos to find his son and others missing in action.

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.
